text: me athara ahaliyagoda madhya maha widyalaye amaya mahathanthila shishyawa usas pela jiwa widya anshayen palamu thanata pathwima nisa rupiyal lakshayaka mudalak sabaragamu palath sabhawen pirinamimata ehi pradhana amathya mahipala herath mahatha thiranaya kara atha. 2005 wasaredi mahipala herath mahatha sabaragamuwe pradhana amathi wimen pasu 5 wasara, samanya pela, ha usas pela wani tharanga wibhagawaladi, jathika ha jathyanthara mattame kridawaladi dakshatha dakwana sabaragamuwe lamunta rupiyal lakshayak ho eeta wadi mudalak parithyaga kirime wadapiliwelak arambaiya.

namuth ee dewal asana wita mata sinaha pahala wiya.ape siya kiwwa kathawa mata sihi wiya.holman yanu selawena sithaya.mama owunta da pawasuwemi.mata hariyatama mathakayi eda senasurada dawasak.wahi kalaguna thaththwayak thibu hethuwen eda sewayata paminiyeya swalpa deneki.rathri aaharayen pasu nawathath rathri dolahata wiweka kalayak laba deyi.ema kalaya thula api biskat ka the bi kalaya gatha karayi.api aahara ganna kamare dewani mahale pihita thibini.eda dawasata pera dawase sema biskat ka the bi.nawatha pahatha mahale sewa sthanayata paminiyemi.tika welawak yaddi mata pipasayak athi wiya.ma sama thanama wathura bothale sewwemi.ewita mage yaluwek kiwwa wathura bothale aththe dewani mahale bawath eya ragena eemata amathaka wu bawath ya.ma siyallantama eya ragena eemata kiw namuth ohu siyalla ma eya prathikshepa kaleya.ee thaniyama yamata athi biya nisa weni.man ee siyallata bana wada.man wathura bothale gena eemata giyemi.udamalayata giya pasu widuli pahan ekinekata dama awashya karana kamarayata paminiye ya.mesa matha athi wathura bothalaya athata gaddi yamkisi gahanu katahandak mata asuni.ewita nam yamkisi chakithayak mage sithe athi wiya.mokada rathri sewaye di kanthawanta wada kirima thahanam.tika mohothak gathaweddi sadde adala wu bawin ma sithata ata men rathu saha gini bola men wishala deneth yuthu.konde nopiru,kondaya awul sahagatha wu kaluma kalu bhayanaka yuwathiyak dutu wemi.ma kochchara biyata path wuna da kiwahoth.mata ka gasimata pawa nohaki wiya.ma mukhayen wachana pita nowi ya.diwimata kiya awidimata wath nohaki wiya.mage kakul deka pana nathi wiya.dewani mahale sita palaweni mahala dakwa awidimata athi padi pela dige bimata ada watini.bimata ada watunu pasu nawathath ma nagita sewa kamarayata diwa giyemi.namuth ma yaluwanta eya pawasanne keseda .eya mata lajja sahagatha deyaki.ma kisiwekutath eya pawasuwe natha.namuth ee wana wita ma dahadiyen nawi hamaraya.mawa wewlayi eya matada dane.ma dutu mage mithrayaku ma samipayata pamina ma holawaddi thama mama piyawi sihiyata paminiye.ma dutu siyalla sidu wu de siyalla therum aragena thibuni.owunta eya purudu jawanikawaki.mokada mewani siduwim siyalla asin dutu ee nisaweni.owun mage niwasata durakathana amathumak di sidu wu de pawasa ma niwasata ragena giyeya.inen pahala kotasa pana nathi wiya.awidimata nohaki wiya.gedara giya pasu eelanga dawase ape gewal langa athi dewalayakata ma ragena giye ya.kapu mahaththayata siyalla pawasa mata dehi kapa nulak athe gata gasuwath mata kisi suwayak nomathi wiya.mata thawamath awidimata nohaki wiya.mulu angama gaheyi.pasuwa thewaththa palliye piyathumaku langata gena giya mage maniyan piyathumata siyalla pawasana ladi.pasuwa piyathumage mese uda thibu wishala kurusayak ragena mage hisa matha thaba yachnya kirima aarambha kale.
